title: Did a black woman named Melinda Borden Berish because the Titanic lifeboats were "white only? '
subtitle: There's no doubt that sex, age, and class played a role in securing seats for the lifeboat in Titanic.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The picture shows a black woman named Melinda Borden, who was denied a spot in a lifeboat on Titanic because she was black.
